attributes.action: That he keeps at least one promise he made to the British people and allow us a referundum vote on  any attempts to bring in an European Consitution .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed treaty that is on the table at the next European meeting is nothing but an exercise in bring in a failed Consitution through the back door. This is being done by altering words but not their meaning and telling us tha tit is a tidying up exercise. The people of France and Holland said No The unelected   in europe do not want to accept that anyone result that is agianst them. So we should have our Chance to say NO or YES before it is too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
